1 Point.Corner the Market: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.
1 Point.Diversify Research: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors
1 Point.Found Research Outpost: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties
1 Point.Intimidate Council: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System.
1 Point.Lead from the Front: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools
1 Point.Amass Wealth: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.
1 Point.Engineer a Marvel: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board.
1 Point.Explore Deep Space: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.
1 Point.Improve Infrastrure: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.
1 Point.Make History: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.
1 Point.Populate the Outer Rim: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.
1 Point.Push Boundaries: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.
1 Point.Raise a Fleet: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

2 Points.Conquer the Weak: Control 1 planet in the home system of another player
2 Points.Form Galactic Brain Trust: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties
2 Points.Galvanize the People: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools
2 Points.Master the Sciences: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.
2 Points.Unify the Colonies: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

Stake your Claim.Desc: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

Demonstrate Your Power.Desc: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

Expand Borders.Desc: Control six planets in non-home systems.

Form a Spy Network.Desc: Have 5 action cards in your hand.

Gather a Mighty Fleet.Desc: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.

Make History.Desc: Control Mecatol Rex and have at least 3 ships in its system.

Master the Laws.Desc: Have 3 or more laws in play.

Occupy the Fringe.Desc: Control a planet that is in a system adjacent to an anomaly.

Protect the Border.Desc: Have a space dock in a system that contains a planet you control that is adjacent to a planet another player controls.

Prove Endurance.Desc: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

Raise a Fleet.Desc: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

Rule Distant Lands.Desc: Control a planet that is in a system that is not adjacent to your home system.

Sway the Council.Desc: Be elected by a law or have a planet you control be elected by a law.

Turn Their Fleets to Dust.Desc: Destroy 2 ships belonging to another player in a single space combat.

Unveil Flagship.Desc: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship.

Wield Core Influence.Desc: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

Wield Core Resources.Desc: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

Become the Gatekeeper.Desc: Control both an alpha and a beta wormhole.

Defy Space and Time.Desc: Have a unit in the wormhole nexus.

Forge an Alliance.Desc: Have a promissory note in your play area that was not dealt to you.

Diversify Research.Desc: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.

Engineer a Marvel.Desc: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

Establish Hegemony.Desc: Be neighbors with all other players.

Raise a Legion.Desc: Have 9 ground forces on a single planet that does not contain a space dock.

Reclaim Ancient Monuments.Desc: Control 2 planets that each have a technology specialty.

Revolutionize Warfare.Desc: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

Scavenge Remnants.Desc: Have 2 relic fragments of the same type.

Threaten Enemies.Desc: Control a planet in a system adjacent to another player's home system.

Turn Their Worlds to Ashes.Desc: Use bombardment to destroy all infantry on a planet.

Vanquish Their Armada.Desc: Destroy another player's flagship or war sun.

Wipe Their Forces.Desc: Destroy all of another player's fighters in a single combat using anti-fighter barrage.
